message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to match this price again.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the opportunity, but $950,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for this product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
